DPi.content: damnum, via Benveniste, money given w/out return, given for nothing > excess of compelled expenditure pays more than is due, marks double law of homogeneity/proportionality btwn damage/punishment & their incalculable heterogeneity: the condemned/damned pays what he owes and does something tout autre, infinitely more than acquit himself of calculable debt: there is economy/aneconomy > “unless it is a matter of reimbursement (indemnification) and interest as the incalculable surplus value of capital”
